availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: N. Beall Gantt (merchant, dupty marshal of Louisville Chancery Court)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant and deputy marshal of Louisville Chancery Court. Married to Amanda Morgan on December 18, 1855. Father of Laura Gantt. Telegraph operator in Louisville in 1850. Coal dealer in Louisville in 1859. Deputy marshal of the Louisville Chancery Court.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 1, p. 174B.
